heading: HR01278
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF  EDUCATION TO GIVE DUE RECOGNITION TO THE MANY YEARS OF VALUABLE SERVICE UNDER DIFFICULT CIRCUMSTANCES OF 30 PROVISIONAL TEACHERS IN THE DIVISION OF ISABELA CITY, BASILAN WHO HAVE TAUGHT FOR 11 TO 25 YEARS UNDER TEMPORARY APPOINTMENTS BUT WHOSE APPOINTMENTS WERE TERMINATED IN 2012
principal-authors: TINIO, ANTONIO L.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.;
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2017-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01278
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION TO GIVE DUE RECOGNITION TO THE MANY YEARS OF VALUABLE SERVICE UNDER DIFFICULT CIRCUMSTANCES OF 30 PROVISIONAL TEACHERS IN THE DIVISION OF ISABELA CITY, BASILAN WHO HAVE TAUGHT FOR 11 TO 25 YEARS UNDER TEMPORARY APPOINTMENTS BUT WHOSE APPOINTMENTS WERE TERMINATED IN 2012
